text: <!channel>: Happy Monday! I have a dentist appt this afternoon, so won't be here for stand-up. Let's check in here!
Mary: sent updated UX deck to the client.
I've been working on some wrap-up of the refactor I did last week. It wasn't quite as clean as I wanted. I'll get to the new round of assets before EOD
I got a little sidetracked with a regression where a custom-named movie would have an incorrect title frame

my lego update:

cut some more assets for the stickers section that came from a  resolution for the UX issues scott brought up friday for scale/rotate. still need to cut a couple for iPad.

other than that, gonna work on updating and finishing up the instructions section redesign today.
